snippet: The government and the rebels of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia agreed Thursday to form a commission that would seek to shed light on atrocities committed during their war once it is over.
abstract: Colombian government and rebels from Revolutionary Armed Forces of Columbia agree to form truth commission to investigate war time atrocities, convening when final peace agreement is signed.
lead_paragraph: The government and the rebels of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia agreed Thursday to form a commission that would seek to shed light on atrocities committed during their war once it is over.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Colombia: Truth Commission Planned
